property.name: fs.trash.interval
property.description: Number of minutes after which the checkpoint gets deleted. If zero, the trash feature is disabled.

property.name: fs.trash.checkpoint.interval
property.description: Number of minutes between trash checkpoints. Should be smaller or equal to fs.trash.interval. Every time the checkpointer runs it creates a new checkpoint out of current and removes checkpoints created more thanfs.trash.interval minutes ago.
